articles.description: The next pandemic could come from the Amazon rainforest, warns Brazilian ecologist David Lapola, who says human encroachment on animals' habitats - a likely culprit in the coronavirus outbreak - is soaring there because of rampant deforestation.
articles.content:
The next pandemic could come from the Amazon rainforest, warns Brazilian ecologist David Lapola, who says human encroachment on animals' habitats - a likely culprit in the coronavirus outbreak - is soaring there because of rampant deforestation.

articles.title: Coronavirus: How 'overreaction' made Vietnam a virus success - BBC News
articles.description: Vietnam chose to prevent rather than fight Covid-19, a strategy which means it has had no virus deaths.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Vietnam has already started opening up again after weeks of no local cases

articles.title: Coronavirus: Reopening NHS services must be safe, unions say - BBC South East Wales
articles.description: Hospitals face another "crucial test" when outpatient clinics and operations resume, health unions say.
articles.content:

Rapid testing and an adequate supply of protective equipment must be in place when the NHS reopens services cancelled during the peak of the coronavirus oubreak, health unions have said.
